verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> or Psalm <WH4210> of Asaph. <WH623> Keep not thou silence, <WH408> <WH1824> O God: <WH430> hold not thy peace, <WH2790> <WH408> and be not <WH408> still, <WH8252> O God. <WH410>
For, <WH3588> lo, <WH2009> thine enemies <WH341> make a tumult: <WH1993> and they that hate <WH8130> thee have lifted up <WH5375> the head. <WH7218>
They have taken crafty <WH6191> counsel <WH5475> against <WH5921> thy people, <WH5971> and consulted <WH3289> against <WH5921> thy hidden ones. <WH6845>

They have said, <WH559> Come, <WH1980> and let us cut them off <WH3582> from being a nation; <WH4480> <WH1471> that the name <WH8034> of Israel <WH3478> may be no <WH3808> more <WH5750> in remembrance. <WH2142>
For <WH3588> they have consulted together <WH3289> with one consent: <WH3820> <WH3162> they are confederate <WH1285> <WH3772> against <WH5921> thee:
The tabernacles <WH168> of Edom, <WH123> and the Ishmaelites; <WH3459> of Moab, <WH4124> and the Hagarenes; <WH1905>
Gebal, <WH1381> and Ammon, <WH5983> and Amalek; <WH6002> the Philistines <WH6429> with <WH5973> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Tyre; <WH6865>
Assur <WH804> also <WH1571> is joined <WH3867> with <WH5973> them: they have <WH1961> helped <WH2220> the children <WH1121> of Lot. <WH3876> Selah. <WH5542>
Do <WH6213> unto them as unto the Midianites; <WH4080> as to Sisera, <WH5516> as to Jabin, <WH2985> at the brook <WH5158> of Kison: <WH7028>
Which perished <WH8045> at Endor: <WH5874> they became <WH1961> as dung <WH1828> for the earth. <WH127>
Make <WH7896> their nobles <WH5081> like Oreb, <WH6159> and like Zeeb: <WH2062> yea, all <WH3605> their princes <WH5257> as Zebah, <WH2078> and as Zalmunna: <WH6759>
Who <WH834> said, <WH559> Let us take <WH3423> to ourselves <WH853> the houses <WH4999> of God <WH430> in possession.
O my God, <WH430> make <WH7896> them like a wheel; <WH1534> as the stubble <WH7179> before <WH6440> the wind. <WH7307>
As the fire <WH784> burneth <WH1197> a wood, <WH3293> and as the flame <WH3852> setteth the mountains on fire; <WH2022> <WH3857>
So <WH3651> persecute <WH7291> them with thy tempest, <WH5591> and make them afraid <WH926> with thy storm. <WH5492>
Fill <WH4390> their faces <WH6440> with shame; <WH7036> that they may seek <WH1245> thy name, <WH8034> O LORD. <WH3068>
Let them be confounded <WH954> and troubled <WH926> forever; <WH5704> <WH5703> yea, let them be put to shame, <WH2659> and perish: <WH6>
That men may know <WH3045> that <WH3588> thou, <WH859> whose name <WH8034> alone <WH905> is JEHOVAH, <WH3068> art the most high <WH5945> over <WH5921> all <WH3605> the earth. <WH776>
